sourcesContent: import axios from 'axios'; export default { data() { return { imageUrl: '', // Preview image URL results: null, // Analysis results error: null, // Error message isLoading: false, // Loading indicator }; }, methods: { handleImageUpload(event) { const imageFile = event.target.files[0]; if (!imageFile) return; const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => { this.imageUrl = reader.result; }; reader.readAsDataURL(imageFile); }, async submitImage() { if (!this.imageUrl) { alert('Please select an image.'); return; } this.isLoading = true; this.error = null; try { const formData = new FormData(); formData.append('image', this.imageUrl); // Base64 encoding // Replace with your actual API endpoint URL const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/process_image', formData, { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data', // Or adjust based on API requirements }, }); this.results = response.data; this.imageUrl = ''; // Clear image preview after successful submission } catch (error) { this.error = 'Error processing image: ' + error.message; console.error('Error:', error); } finally { this.isLoading = false; } }, }, };
